role.descr: displayed to whom? Seer of thing displayed

example.name: all arguments
example.text: She-1 had gone so far as [*-1] to display the questions on an overhead projector and underline the answers .

example.name: transitive
example.text: [The prime minister , whose hair [*T*-298] is thinning and gray and whose face [*T*-299] has a perpetual pallor ,]-1 nonetheless continues [*-1] to display an energy , a precision of thought and a willingness [*] to say publicly what most other Asian leaders dare [*-2] say [*T*-300] only privately .
example.arg: an energy , a precision of thought and a willingness [*] to say publicly what most other Asian leaders dare [*-2] say [*T*-300] only privately

example.name: Arg2 as a subject
example.text: One color photo displays a rainbow of dress shirts tied [*] in a knot ; another picture shows neckties with bold designs .
example.arg: a rainbow of dress shirts tied [*] in a knot

predicate.note: Frames file for 'display' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.
